# Energized Shield (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[see text]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Shield touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 79

*A silver aura surrounds the touched shield for a moment before it appears to transform into the chosen type of energy. The shield hums with power.*

This spell functions like *[[Energized Shield, Lesser (Spell)|lesser energized shield]]**,* except that the energy resistance is 10 and damage dealt is 2d6.
